name: HappyWP – Disable Comments, Auto-update Emails, and More.
author: Saifudheen Mak

sections.description:
Disable comments, plugin update emails, theme update emails, and more on your wordpress site. Go to Settings -> HappyWP Options after installing the plugin.

Features

  • 100% free wordpress plugin, no paid upgrades!
  • Easy configuration
  • Disable plugin auto-update Email notification
  • Disable theme auto-update Email notification
  • Disable Comments
  • Disable WordPress admin notices
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through Plugins -> Add New or Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/happy-wp-options directory
  2. Activate ‘HappyWP’ plugin through the ‘Plugins’ page in WordPress
  3. Go to ‘Settings -> HappyWP Options’ to configure settings.
sections.faq:
Do you provide plugin support?

Yes, I am happy to provide support for free of cost.
